title: 03/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/30/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin warns the NFL teams picking at the top of the draft this season who are considering young quarterbacks and why they might be making a big mistake. He defends the 49ers for preparing to move on from Jimmy Garoppolo and why he might be moving into '3 strike territory'. He also discusses Zion Williamson's dominance so far and puts his career arch in proper perspective up to this point. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown the best prospects in this year's draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
